incidents.name: Error 53113 “Room Exists” When Creating Video Rooms via API

incident_updates.body: The issue of creating video rooms via API has been resolved. Video Rooms via API is operating normally at this time.
Video Rooms via API is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

A subset of customers might continue receiving 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. As a workaround, customers can create rooms with different names. Our engineers implemented temporary measures to make this issue less frequent until a permanent solution is created. We will provide another update in 72 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

A subset of customers might receive 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. As a workaround, customers can create rooms with different names. Our engineers implemented temporary measures to make this issue less frequent until a permanent solution is created. We will provide another update in 72 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some customers might receive 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. As a workaround, customers can create rooms with different names. Our engineers implemented temporary measures to make this issue less frequent until a permanent solution is created. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Rooms. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues With New WhatsApp Senders Creation

incident_updates.body: The issue of new customers creating new WhatsApp senders was detected to begin March 16th and has now been resolved. Any impacted customers may retry creating WhatsApp senders. WhatsApp is operating normally at this time.

We are observing recovery in new customers creating new WhatsApp senders. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified that the issue causing errors when creating new WhatsApp senders is only impacting new customers. Existing customers should not be impacted. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified that the issue causing errors when creating new WhatsApp senders is only impacting new customers. Existing customers should not be impacted. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Flex Insights not Loading for Some Customers

incident_updates.body: The issues related to the data loading have been resolved and Flex Insights is operating normally at this time.
Flex Insights is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have confirmed that our third-party service provider is experiencing an issue, which is affecting some customers’ access to Flex Insights. Our engineering team is working with our third-party service provider to reach a resolution. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have confirmed that our third-party service provider is experiencing an issue, which is affecting some customers’ access to Flex Insights. incidents.name: Video Recording Compositions Staled in Enqueued Status

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Programmable Video was degraded for 26 minutes between 15:43:49 and 15:59:49 PDT on March 13th, 2023. During this period 1.8% video compositions failed to be processed and 50 Accounts were impacted. Video compositions that get stuck in Enqueued status were manually changed to Failed status. Customers that were impacted should re-submit the compositions requests again. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with video compositions. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Elevated Error Rate and Latency with Adyen Payment Processing

incident_updates.body: The issue causing elevated error rates and latency for customer integrations with Adyen <pay> platform has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time. Please refer here for more details - https://www.adyen.com/landing/platform-status.

Twilio has detected elevated error rate and latency for customer integrations with Adyen <pay> platform. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available. Customers are advised to use PayPal as a workaround. Please refer to https://www.adyen.com/landing/platform-status"

incidents.name: High Service Latency Issues for Customer Integrations with Adyen <pay> Platform

incident_updates.body: The issue causing high service latency for customer integrations with Adyen <pay> platform has been resolved and the service is functioning normally at this time. This incident has been resolved. Please refer here for more details - https://www.adyen.com/landing/platform-status.

Twilio has detected high service latency for customer integrations with Adyen <pay> platform . Customers may experience failures of payments via <Pay> and Pay Agent Assist due to an incident with Adyen. Please see their status page at https://status.adyen.com/

incidents.name: Issues With New Customers Changing Currency from USD

incident_updates.body: The issue with new customers not being able to change their currency settings away from USD currency, in Twilio Console has been resolved. Customers creating trial accounts can now change their default Currency away from USD.

We are investigating a potential issue with new customers being able to change their currency settings away from USD currency, in Twilio Console. Our engineering team is actively investigating. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with new customers being able to change their currency settings away from USD currency, in Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Delays in Voice Transcriptions with VoiceBase

incident_updates.body: Voice Transcriptions with VoiceBase were degraded for 27 minutes between 06:51 and 7:18 Pacific Time on 03/16/2022. During this period, customers may have experienced delayed transcriptions. The issue has now been resolved.
